binaryOption.name: dac_c1_dmaen
binaryOption.toolTip: When DMA is enabled, the DMA request will be generated by original interrupts.\n The interrupts will not be presented on this module at the same time

choiceOption.name: dac_c1_dacbfmd
choiceOption.toolTip:
Modes
 Normal: Increments from 0 to max and wraps
 Swing: Increments from 0 to max, decrements downto 0
 One-Time: Increments from 0 to max and stops

binaryOption.name: dac_c1_dacbfen
binaryOption.toolTip: If enabled the converted data is the word that the read pointer points to is used.\n This means converted data can be from any word of the buffer

choice.name: Buffer read pointer disabled. Converted data is first buffer word.
